body: Martial mystics expunge corruption from duergar society.
name: Duergar Monks

sections.special_attacks: flurry of blows, stunning fist (2/day, DC 13)
sections.melee: unarmed strike +3 (1d6+2) or unarmed strike flurry of blows +2/+2 (1d6+2)
sections.feats: Combat Reflexes, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Innate Flexibility*, Stunning Fist
sections.ranged: shuriken +3 (1d2+2) or shuriken flurry of blows +2/+2 (1d2+2)
sections.name: Duergar Anvil
sections.combat_gear: potion of cure light wounds, potions of invisibility (2), thunderstones (4)

sections.ac: 25, touch 21, flat-footed 20 (+3 armor, +1 deflection, +4 Dex, +1 dodge, +3 monk, +1 natural, +2 Wis)
sections.special_attacks: flurry of blows, stunning fist (12/day, DC 18)
sections.melee: unarmed strike +14/+9 (2d6+2) or unarmed strike flurry of blows +15/+15/+10/+10/+5 (2d6+2)
sections.other_gear: +2 shuriken (10), amulet of natural armor +1, belt of incredible dexterity +2, bracers of armor +3, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1,  588 gp
sections.feats: Dodge, Gray Dwarf Magic* (ironskin *), Extra Ki, Improved Initiative, Improved Unarmed Strike, Innate Flexibility* (2), Mobility, Spring Attack, Stunning Fist, Weapon Finesse
sections.ranged: +2 shuriken +16/+11 (1d2+4) or +2 shuriken flurry of blows +17/+17/+12/+12/+7 (1d2+4)
sections.special_qualities: born in darkness, earth glide, fade from sight, fast movement, gray heart, ki pool (10 points, cold iron, lawful, magic), maneuver training, slow and steady, stability
sections.name: Duergar Hammer
sections.skills: Acrobatics +20 (+32 when jumping), Escape Artist +20, Perception +17, Stealth +20
